title: Is a New Halo Game Coming? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.05.20
description:
Blessing is joined by Spawn On Me's Kahlief Adams to discuss a possible new Halo game, Call of Duty saying Black Lives Matter, and more.  
FOLLOW KAHLIEF ADAMS: 
https://twitter.com/Kahjahkins
https://twitter.com/spawnonme 
https://twitch.tv/spawnonme 
https://www.youtube.com/spawnonme
https://www.patreon.com/spawnonme 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:09:28 - Housekeeping
Blessing’s been making the rounds this week! This is where you can find me:
The latest episode of Beyond, with Lucy O'brien, Jonathan Dornbush, and the homie Funke, over at IGN.com
Inside Gaming’s video game news podcast “Send News”, with Brian Gaar, Woolie Madden, and Alanah Pearce, over on YouTube.com/InsideGaming
I was also on Game Case Trivia as part of Gamespot’s charity stream. That features me joining Ben Hanson and Suriel from Minn Max, Brandon Jones from Easy Allies, and Jake Baldino from Gameranx. That’s available right now on Youtube.com/Gamespot.
Lastly, I was of course on the latest episode of Spawn On Me titled “A Lesson in Blackness” with Kahlief, Pikachulita, ZombaeKillz, Parris, and Cameron Hawkins and that’s available on Youtube.com/SpawnOnMe
Later today, at 1pm pt, I’m gonna be on US Gamer as part of their charity stream. Me, Imran, and Kahlief are gonna be throwing hands in Mortal Kombat 11. That’s happening live on youtube.com/usgamernet.
The Guerilla Collective, the return of the Kinda Funny Games Showcase in partnership with Media Indie Exchange, has been postponed.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:15:35 - There’s a New 'Halo' project in the works at 343 Industries - Asher Madan @ Windows Central
00:22:15 - Call of Duty adds a screen that says Black Lives Matter - Sam Byford @ TheVerge
00:27:32 - Activision shareholders think CEO Bobby Kotick is paid too much - Sherif Saed @ VG24/7
00:34:42 - Sony has been Fined $3.5 Million for Misleading Australian Consumers - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:39:30 - Out today
00:43:40 - Reader mail   -
00:44:40 - Rank the "Classic Mini" consoles - KBABZ
00:53:37 - Squad Up: HBD - Frankfurtter!
00:54:50 - Shout-outs!
01:01:02 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Tim and Greg
Tuesday: Imran and Fran
Wednesday: Greg and Gary
Thursday: Greg and Blessing
Friday: Greg and Blessing
Post Show - 01:01:52
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
